attributes.action: Bring Boxing back to the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
For too long, Boxing has been cast to the dark ages by both the BBC and the TV networks in the UK. We HAVE to pay £150 per year, yet we see hardly any sports on BBC 1 or 2, in particular Boxing, which I can prove is the second most popular sport in the UK behind soccer. If ever the United Kingdom needed positive role models, and relevant programmes to motivate and educate our youth, it is the re-introduction of Boxing.

http://www.theboxingobserver.com/boxing-observer-special-report-the-hypocrisy-of-the-bbc-and-why-boxnation-must-survive/
